title: Arkose Labs | Senior Software Engineer | Pune
content:
Education: B.E from Tier-1 Institute
Years of Experience: 2 years as backend software developer
Prior Experience: Software Engineer at mid-sized startup (300+)
For experienced engineer, what's your current and past experience? 3 years in hardware, 2 years in software
Date of the Offer: 5th October, 2023
Company: Arkose Labs
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Pune
Salary: 35 LPA Fixed
Relocation/Signing Bonus: Reimbursement of flights (18k), Movers & Packers (1 Lac), and Hotel stay (25k)
Stock bonus: 20000 units vesting over 4 years, 25% after first year and rest vesting equally over next 36 months
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 35 LPA + equity (Not quite sure of it's value)
Benefits: Insurance for whole family (me + spouse + parents + parents-in-law).  Other benefits are still being setup, I cared mostly about this one. 
Other details: I had another offer from a bangalore based MNC for same amount, could have negotiated better but I was desperate for this move and most Pune companies were only offering 25-30 at best. Hoping the lower rent etc. will mean more savings. 

Interview Experience: Will post in a short while
salaryTotal: : 35 Lpa + Equity (not Quite Sure Of It\'s Value)
